summary: "Boy Meets World" is an American TV show about a boy named Cory Matthews (Ben Savage) growing up. It aired on ABC from 1993 to 2000. Cory's life, from childhood to adulthood, is shown through his experiences at home and school. His teacher, Mr. Feeny, teaches him important life lessons. Cory is close to his family, especially his brother Eric and his friends, including Shawn Hunter. The show also focuses on Cory's relationship with Topanga Lawrence. It was created for teens and had many popular characters. The show was successful and later had a spin-off called "Girl Meets World."
title: Boy Meets World
